name: "/BlowKiss" Emote Tome
description: Consuming this tome will give you access to a new emote!

name: Black Lion Twisted Imaginarium Cabinet Recipe
description: This activates the decorations recipe for your homestead instance. One decoration will be immediately available to use.

name: Black Lion Twisted Imaginarium Choya Statue Recipe
description: This activates the decorations recipe for your homestead instance. One decoration will be immediately available to use.

name: Imperial Everbloom Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Imperial Everbloom Spear Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other spear.

name: Vial of Titan Melted Liquid Obsidian

name: Homestead Recipe Book: Fractals of the Mists, Volume 2
description: A book of homestead decoration recipes needed to craft objects from Fractals of the Mists.

name: Ward Knight's Cape Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current back item. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Wayward Wisp Quest License
description: Acquiring this item unlocks a quest from the Wizard's Vault to obtain the forest wisp accessory and infusion.

name: Ward Knight's Shoulder Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current shoulder armor. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Longbeak Parrotfish
description: Double-click to convert to materials.

name: Ferocious Fusions Mount Adoption License
description:
Gain a random mount skin that you do not already own from the Black Lion Stables. Right-click to preview available mount skins.

<c=#F8C56E>All unobtained skins have an equal chance of dropping.</c>

name: Magister
description: Unlock this title on acquisition.

name: Relic of the Eagle
description: Deal increased strike damage to low-health enemies.

name: True Sight Armor Recipe: Shoulders
description: A book of recipes needed to craft True Sight shoulders.

name: Decima's Magnificent Coffer
description: Double-click to open. Right-click for more options.

name: Relic of Vampirism
description: Siphon life from nearby foes when you use a healing skill. Restore a portion of your maximum health upon killing a foe.

description: A book of homestead decoration recipes needed to craft Krytan objects.

name: Ward Knight's Boots Skin
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current boots. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Old-Growth Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Relic of Altruism
description: Grant might and fury to nearby allies after using a healing skill.

name: Acknowledgement to Deft Lahar
description:
Purchasing the recipes in this tab instead of earning them by completing the respective Home Sweet Homestead achievements incurs a significant convenience fee. You cannot obtain a refund if you complete the achievements later on.

<c=@flavor>"The best things in life are free, unless you want them now. In that case, pay for them, you will."</c>

name: Mini Yagon
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Warmaster
description: Unlock this title on acquisition.
